statements: SELECT * FROM InventoryManagement;
SELECT product_name, current_inventory FROM InventoryManagement WHERE current_inventory > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM InventoryManagement ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryManagement WHERE current_inventory < 10 AND reorder_point < 5;
SELECT product_name, current_inventory FROM InventoryManagement WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM InventoryManagement ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_inventory FROM InventoryManagement WHERE current_inventory < reorder_point;
SELECT product_name, current_inventory, reorder_point FROM InventoryManagement WHERE current_inventory < 50 AND reorder_point > 20;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_inventory FROM InventoryManagement ORDER BY current_inventory ASC, product_name;
SELECT product_name, current_inventory FROM InventoryManagement WHERE reorder_point BETWEEN 10 AND 30 ORDER BY current_inventory DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock > 10;
SELECT product_id, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE reorder_point < 5;
SELECT product_id, current_stock, reorder_point FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < reorder_point;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY current_stock ASC;
SELECT * FROM reorder_points WHERE reorder_quantity > 20;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < 10 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT product_id, reorder_point FROM inventory_levels JOIN reorder_points ON inventory_levels.product_id = reorder_points.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock > reorder_point ORDER BY current_stock DESC, product_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, current_stock, reorder_point FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock > 0 AND product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products;
SELECT order_id, order_quantity, order_date FROM orders;
SELECT product_id, current_level, reorder_point FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, product_id FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price < 1000 AND unit_price >= 500 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT product_id, current_level, reorder_point FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_level < reorder_point;
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_quantity, order_date, delivery_date FROM orders WHERE order_quantity > 10 AND order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price, current_level, reorder_point FROM products p INNER JOIN inventory_levels i ON p.product_id = i.product_id;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE total_cost > 1000
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_stock < reorder_point
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id DESC
SELECT order_id, order_quantity, completion_status FROM ProductionStatus WHERE completion_status = TRUE
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_person LIKE '%John%'
SELECT * FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_stock < reorder_point ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_stock > 0 AND product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM ProductionStatus WHERE completion_status = FALSE);
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_person LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, po.total_cost FROM InventoryLevels p JOIN PurchaseOrders po ON p.product_id = po.product_id WHERE po.delivery_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY po.total_cost DESC;

SELECT SUM(order_quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(total_cost) AS average_cost FROM ProductionStatus JOIN PurchaseOrders ON ProductionStatus.order_id = PurchaseOrders.order_id WHERE ProductionStatus.completion_status = TRUE GROUP BY ProductionStatus.product_id HAVING total_quantity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_inventory FROM inventory ORDER BY current_inventory DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE current_inventory < reorder_point;
SELECT product_name, current_inventory FROM inventory ORDER BY current_inventory DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, transaction_type, quantity, transaction_date FROM inventory JOIN transactions ON inventory.product_id = transactions.product_id;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
